definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: One of the characteristics of lava and debris valleys is a U-shaped transverse profile.
sentences.chinese: 熔岩流及泥石流谷的特點之一是橫剖面爲U型。

sentences.english: A design of midship section is one of the most important part of ship structure design.
sentences.chinese: 中橫剖面設計是船舶結構設計的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: The construction of cross-sections and block diagrams is also outlined.
sentences.chinese: 本書還概述了橫剖面和立體圖的製作法。

sentences.english: We were interested in the shape of the complex in vertical cross-section.
sentences.chinese: 橫剖面的岩脈組合的形狀感興趣。

sentences.english: It also looks symmetrical in profile.
sentences.chinese: 在橫剖面上它看起來也是對稱的。

sentences.english: Analysis of the topography across the front also shows unusually high relief there.
sentences.chinese: 分析前緣的橫剖面地形，也可看出地勢不尋常的增高。
